TextEng: I am <FullName>. I serve the Lords' Alliance and the city of Neverwinter!
Text: 나는 <FullName>이다. 영주 연합과 네버윈터 시를 섬기고 있지!

TextEng: Who are you?
Die, lizardwoman scum!
I will not answer your questions!
Me <FullName>. Me serve Neverwinter.
Who you be?
Me kill you!
Me no talk you!
Maugrim is the enemy of Neverwinter!
Uh... yes. I serve Maugrim. Do you have a message for him?
Text: 어... 그래. 나는 모그림을 섬겨. 그에게 전할 말이 있어?

TextEng: I shall not rest until Maugrim is dead!
Me no serve Maugrim. He bad man.
Text: 나 모그림 안 섬겨. 그 나쁜 놈.

TextEng: Me want kill Maugrim!
I have answered your questions. Now tell me who you are!
Text: 네 질문에 대답했어. 이제 네가 누군지 말해!

TextEng: Tell me something I don't know.
Me tell you me name. Now who you be?
Text: 나 이름 말했어. 이제 너 누구?

TextEng: Who are you?
I don't have time for this!
Who you be?
What lizard girly need tell?
Me no got time for story!
Maugrim will never succeed! I will stop him!
Text: 모그림은 절대 성공 못 해! 내가 막을 거야!

TextEng: Wow, thanks Haedraline. I would have never figured Maugrim was seeking world domination without that little history of your people.
Text: 와, 고마워 하에드랄린. 네 종족 역사 얘기 없었으면 모그림이 세계 정복을 노린다는 걸 절대 몰랐을 거야.

TextEng: No worry, lizard girly. Me stop Maugrim!
Text: 걱정 마, 도마뱀 여자. 나 모그림 막아!

TextEng: Maugrim want be Master? Even dumb old me figure that out. You *BIG* help, lizard girly.
Text: 모그림 주인 되고 싶어? 바보 나도 그거 알아. 넌 *진짜* 도움 됐어, 도마뱀 여자.

TextEng: What? What's wrong?
You hurt, lizard girly?
Wait, you were going to say something more about the Words!
Text: 잠깐, 언령에 대해 더 말하려고 했잖아!

TextEng: Morag? Who's Morag? Tell me before it's too late!
Text: 모라그? 모라그가 누구야? 늦기 전에 말해!

TextEng: No go yet! What you say about Words, lizard girly?
Text: 아직 가지 마! 언령 뭐라고 했어, 도마뱀 여자?

TextEng: Morag? Who that? No go, lizard girly. Tell who Morag be!
Text: 모라그? 그게 누구? 가지 마, 도마뱀 여자. 모라그 누구야!

TextEng: Good. With your spell gone maybe I can leave this stupid room!
Text: 좋아. 네 주문이 풀렸으니 이 바보 같은 방을 나갈 수 있겠군!

TextEng: You go bye-bye, girly lizard. Maybe me make door open now.
Text: 도마뱀 여자 빠이빠이. 이제 나 문 열 수 있겠다.

TextEng: Morag?
Source Stone? What's the Source Stone?
Morag... You mentioned her once before.
Who are you?
What be Source Stone?
Who be Morag?
Who you be?
So you think if Morag awakes she'll turn the North into a tropical jungle?
Text: 그래서 모라그가 깨어나면 북부를 열대 정글로 바꿀 거라고 생각해?

TextEng: Morag make winter go away? She got big magic!
Text: 모라그가 겨울 없애? 그녀 마법 엄청 세!

TextEng: Morag was foolish to trust her fate to a group of slaves.
Text: 모라그는 자신의 운명을 노예 무리에게 맡기다니 어리석었어.

TextEng: Morag big stupid, hoping slaves wake her up!
Text: 모라그 진짜 바보, 노예들이 깨워줄 거라고 기대하다니!

TextEng: How did Maugrim become involved in all this?
Text: 모그림이 어떻게 이 모든 일에 관여하게 된 거야?

TextEng: How Maugrim get mixed up in this stuff?
What do you have to tell me?
Word Slaves?
Old Ones?
When the world was hot? What are you talking about?
What does this have to do with me?
Why you tell me this?
Can you tell me about the extinction of the Old Ones?
Text: 태고의 존재들의 멸종에 대해 말해줄 수 있어?

TextEng: If your people were wiped out, how did you survive?
Text: 네 종족이 전멸했다면, 넌 어떻게 살아남은 거야?

TextEng: Why "Creator Race" go bye-bye?
If lizard girly friends all dead, why lizard girly still here?
Text: 도마뱀 여자 친구들 다 죽었으면, 왜 도마뱀 여자 아직 여기 있어?

TextEng: There better be a point to all this.
Text: 이 모든 게 무슨 의미가 있어야 할 텐데.

TextEng: You story boring. Hurry finish, lizard girly.
Text: 너 이야기 지루해. 빨리 끝내, 도마뱀 여자.

TextEng: What happened to the Words of Power when the Old Ones died?
Text: 태고의 존재들이 죽었을 때 권능의 언령은 어떻게 됐어?

TextEng: What does this have to do with Maugrim?
What you mean, world be hot? World not hot! World be cold!
Text: 세상 뜨거웠다고? 세상 안 뜨거워! 세상 추워!

TextEng: What happened to this tropical paradise?
Text: 이 열대 낙원에 무슨 일이 있었던 거야?

TextEng: Why jungle go bye-bye?
What Maugrim got do with all this?
When Oldies die, where go Power Words?
Text: 옛날 사람들 죽으면, 권능 언령 어디 가?

TextEng: Tell me about the coming of this endless winter.
Text: 이 끝없는 겨울이 오게 된 이유를 말해줘.

TextEng: Where come big winter?
Why would she imprison herself inside this Source Stone?
Text: 왜 그녀가 스스로를 근원석 안에 가뒀을까?

TextEng: Why Morag go inside stone?
Somehow I will stop Maugrim!
Complete and utter devastation. Sounds serious.
Me stop Maugrim!
Morag want make big bad boom. Me not like.
Text: 모라그 큰 폭발 만들고 싶어해. 나 그거 싫어.

TextEng: Die, lizard scum!
Me kill lizard girlie!
